channel.title: Posts on Ramblings of Spedge
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ramblings of Spedge

item.title: Clinical Meetings
item.description: As I've transitioned into being a Senior Manager, I feel like I've had to quickly adapt and learn all sorts of new skills and techniques around the meta of squad management - the management of managers who manage squads. One of the things that really used to irritate me as a squad lead were redundant meetings. You know them, you've all sat through them - the meetings where you know almost everyone is doing something else and questions asked to the room are met by an aggressive level of silence and apathy.

item.title: Hello, world.
item.description: Every year, the idea comes round to write more. To consider things and actually commit them to…paper? Or some such. Anyway, this is my first post in my new blog - hosted by GitHub Pages, powered by Hugo and inspired by a theme which I've adopted, changed and will continue to change as I learn this colouring-in malarky.
